definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: fornication, pl. abstr. intens. (O1:§ 215 a; Dl:Pr 74, der. fr. √ [[זנן]], As. zanânu, fill full, cf. Dl:ib. 73)—´[[ז]] Ho 1:2 + 5 t., cstr. [[זְנוּנֵי]] Na 3:4 + 2 t., [[זְנוּנַיִח]] Ez Eze 23:29, [[זְנוּנֶיהָ]] Ho 2:4, Na 3:4.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: religious 2Ki 9:22, Ez Eze 23:11, Eze 23:29, Ho 2:4, Ho 2:6, Ho 4:12, Ho 5:4.
